cause.description:
we see people fighting. americans fighting afghans. man fighting mother nature. people we need to stop. think about how many innocent people are dying because of assholes like Bush. people please put down the weapons. we are not goin to fight no more. how much of our sisters in africa must be raped by british soldiers. afghan women raped. ask your self are these people really sent to save us or destroy the innocent. PEACE SHALL PREVAIL
1. PEACE ON EARTH
2. LIFE FREE
cause.name: No Blood
